oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Rules and Certification
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jespersen, Lizzie Melby
Sørensen, Linda S.
Rebsdorf, Simon Olling
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Values, standards and certification
Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Development of the database, www.organicrules.org: The database was developed by ICROFS (DARCOF) and FiBL in 2005 - 2006 for comparison of European and international standards with the EU Regulation 2092/91 in the EU FP6 project, ”EEC 2092/91 Revision” (www.organic-revision). In the EU FP7 project, Economic Analysis of Certification Systems in Organic Food and Farming, www.CERTCOST.org (2008-2011). The database has been further developed by ICROFS. The information for the database is collected by the 9 partners of the CERTCOST project, and it is edited by Lizzie Melby Jespersen, ICROFS.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jespersen, Lizzie Melby; Sørensen, Linda S. and Rebsdorf, Simon Olling (2009) Organic Rules and Certification. In: Organic Rules and Certification.
